items.headline: ‘I’m worried about cash flow’: I’m 71 with a $2.7 million IRA and $470K in stocks. Why can’t I relax?
items.summary_en: “My home is paid for and has an estimated value of $700,000.”

items.headline: SAP shares get punished for slight miss on backlog
items.summary_en: Shares of SAP were hammered on Thursday as the German software giant reported slower backlog growth than expected in the fourth quarter and also guided to a slight deceleration this year.

items.headline: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
items.summary_en: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”

items.headline: AT&T’s earnings impress as subscriber growth booms and the stock jumps
items.summary_en: AT&T added 283,000 fiber subscribers and 421,000 net postpaid phone subscribers in the latest quarter, reflecting a push for “convergence” of connectivity offerings.
